verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, unto \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*, that \w dwell|strong="H1753"\w* in \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*; \w Peace|strong="H8001"\w* be \w multiplied|strong="H7680"\w* unto you.

I \w thought|strong="H6925"\w* it \w good|strong="H8232"\w* to \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w signs|strong="H0852"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H8540"\w* that the \w high|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* hath \w wrought|strong="H5648"\w* \w toward|strong="H5974"\w* me.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft I thought…: Chaldee, It was seemly before me\f*

\w How|strong="H4101"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \add are\add* his \w signs|strong="H0852"\w*! and \w how|strong="H4101"\w* \w mighty|strong="H8624"\w* \add are\add* his \w wonders|strong="H8540"\w*! his \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and his \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \add is\add* \w from|strong="H5974"\w* \w generation|strong="H1859"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1859"\w*.

¶ \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* at \w rest|strong="H7954"\w* in mine \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and \w flourishing|strong="H7487"\w* in my \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*:

I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* which made me \w afraid|strong="H1763"\w*, and the \w thoughts|strong="H2031"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w* and the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* me.

\w Therefore|strong="H4481"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* to \w bring|strong="H5954"\w* in \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* me, that they might make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* of the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* in the \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, the \w astrologers|strong="H0826"\w*, the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, and the \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*: and \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w told|strong="H0560"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* them; but they did \w not|strong="H3809"\w* make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

¶ But \w at|strong="H5705"\w* the \w last|strong="H0318"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* came \w in|strong="H5922"\w* before \w me|strong="H6925"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \add was\add* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, according to the \w name|strong="H8036"\w* of my \w god|strong="H0426"\w*, and in whom \add is\add* the \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*: and \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him I \w told|strong="H0560"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \add saying\add*,

O \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, \w master|strong="H7229"\w* of the \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, because \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* that the \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \add is\add* in thee, and \w no|strong="H3606"\w* \w secret|strong="H7328"\w* \w troubleth|strong="H0598"\w* thee, \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of my \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* that I have \w seen|strong="H2370"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

Thus \add were\add* the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*; I \w saw|strong="H1934"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* a \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H7314"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w great|strong="H7690"\w*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft I saw: Chaldee, I was seeing\f*

The \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w grew|strong="H7236"\w*, and was \w strong|strong="H8631"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H7314"\w* thereof \w reached|strong="H4291"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and the \w sight|strong="H2379"\w* thereof to the \w end|strong="H5491"\w* of \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*:

The \w leaves|strong="H6074"\w* thereof \add were\add* \w fair|strong="H8209"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H0004"\w* thereof \w much|strong="H7690"\w*, and in it \add was\add* \w meat|strong="H4203"\w* for \w all|strong="H3606"\w*: the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w* had \w shadow|strong="H2927"\w* \w under|strong="H8460"\w* it, and the \w fowls|strong="H6853"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H1753"\w* in the \w boughs|strong="H6056"\w* thereof, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w* was \w fed|strong="H2110"\w* of \w it|strong="H4481"\w*.

I \w saw|strong="H1934"\w* in the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, and, \w behold|strong="H0431"\w*, a \w watcher|strong="H5894"\w* and an holy \w one|strong="H6922"\w* came \w down|strong="H5182"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*;

He \w cried|strong="H7123"\w* \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w*, Hew \w down|strong="H1414"\w* the \w tree|strong="H0363"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H7113"\w* his \w branches|strong="H6056"\w*, shake \w off|strong="H5426"\w* his \w leaves|strong="H6074"\w*, and \w scatter|strong="H0921"\w* his \w fruit|strong="H0004"\w*: let the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* get \w away|strong="H5111"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* under \w it|strong="H8479"\w*, and the \w fowls|strong="H6853"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* his \w branches|strong="H6056"\w*:\f + \fr 4.14 \ft aloud: Chaldee, with might\f*

\w Nevertheless|strong="H1297"\w* \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* the \w stump|strong="H6136"\w* of his \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, even with a \w band|strong="H0613"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* and \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, in the tender \w grass|strong="H1883"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w*; and let it be \w wet|strong="H6647"\w* with the \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \add let\add* his \w portion|strong="H2508"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* in the \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*:

Let his \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* be \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0606"\w*, and let a \w beast’s|strong="H2423"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* be \w given|strong="H3052"\w* unto him; and let \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* him.

This \w matter|strong="H6600"\w* \add is\add* by the \w decree|strong="H1510"\w* of the \w watchers|strong="H5894"\w*, and the \w demand|strong="H7595"\w* by the \w word|strong="H3983"\w* of the holy \w ones|strong="H6922"\w*: \w to|strong="H5705"\w* the \w intent|strong="H1701"\w* that the \w living|strong="H2417"\w* may \w know|strong="H3046"\w* that the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H7990"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5415"\w* it to \w whomsoever|strong="H4479"\w* he \w will|strong="H6634"\w*, and setteth \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* it the \w basest|strong="H8215"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* have \w seen|strong="H2370"\w*. Now \w thou|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, \w declare|strong="H0560"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, forasmuch \w as|strong="H6903"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of my \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* are \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* to make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*: but \w thou|strong="H0607"\w* \add art\add* \w able|strong="H3546"\w*; for the \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \add is\add* in thee.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \add was\add* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, was \w astonied|strong="H8075"\w* for \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w hour|strong="H8160"\w*, and his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* him. The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, let \w not|strong="H0409"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, or the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, \w trouble|strong="H0927"\w* thee. \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, My \w lord|strong="H4756"\w*, the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \add be\add* to them that \w hate|strong="H8131"\w* thee, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof to thine \w enemies|strong="H6146"\w*.

The \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* that thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w*, which \w grew|strong="H7236"\w*, and was \w strong|strong="H8631"\w*, whose \w height|strong="H7314"\w* \w reached|strong="H4291"\w* unto the \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and the \w sight|strong="H2379"\w* thereof to \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*;

Whose \w leaves|strong="H6074"\w* \add were\add* \w fair|strong="H8209"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H0004"\w* thereof \w much|strong="H7690"\w*, and in it \add was\add* \w meat|strong="H4203"\w* for \w all|strong="H3606"\w*; \w under|strong="H8460"\w* which the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H1753"\w*, and upon whose \w branches|strong="H6056"\w* the \w fowls|strong="H6853"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* had their \w habitation|strong="H7932"\w*:

It \add is\add* \w thou|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that art \w grown|strong="H7236"\w* and become \w strong|strong="H8631"\w*: for thy \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* is \w grown|strong="H7236"\w*, and \w reacheth|strong="H4291"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and thy \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* to the \w end|strong="H5491"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

And whereas the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* a \w watcher|strong="H5894"\w* and an holy \w one|strong="H6922"\w* coming \w down|strong="H5182"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \w saying|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Hew|strong="H1414"\w* the \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w down|strong="H1414"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* it; \w yet|strong="H1297"\w* \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* the \w stump|strong="H6136"\w* of the \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* thereof in the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, even with a \w band|strong="H0613"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* and \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, in the tender \w grass|strong="H1883"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w*; and let it be \w wet|strong="H6647"\w* with the \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \add let\add* his \w portion|strong="H2508"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w*, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* him;

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \add is\add* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \add is\add* the \w decree|strong="H1510"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w*, which is \w come|strong="H4291"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* my \w lord|strong="H4756"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

That they shall \w drive|strong="H2957"\w* thee \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and thy \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w*, and they shall make thee to \w eat|strong="H2939"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* as \w oxen|strong="H8450"\w*, and they shall \w wet|strong="H6647"\w* thee with the \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* thee, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* thou \w know|strong="H3046"\w* that the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H7990"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5415"\w* it to \w whomsoever|strong="H4479"\w* he \w will|strong="H6634"\w*.

And whereas they \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* to \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* the \w stump|strong="H6136"\w* of the \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w roots|strong="H8330"\w*; thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall be \w sure|strong="H7011"\w* unto thee, \w after|strong="H4481"\w* that thou shalt have \w known|strong="H3046"\w* that the \w heavens|strong="H8065"\w* do \w rule|strong="H7990"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="H3861"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let my \w counsel|strong="H4431"\w* be \w acceptable|strong="H8232"\w* unto \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, and break \w off|strong="H6562"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2408"\w* by \w righteousness|strong="H6665"\w*, and thine \w iniquities|strong="H5758"\w* by shewing \w mercy|strong="H2604"\w* to the \w poor|strong="H6033"\w*; \w if|strong="H2006"\w* it may \w be|strong="H1934"\w* a \w lengthening|strong="H0754"\w* of thy \w tranquillity|strong="H7963"\w*.\f + \fr 4.27 \ft a lengthening…: or, an healing of thine error\f*
¶ \w All|strong="H3606"\w* this \w came|strong="H4291"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*.

At the \w end|strong="H7118"\w* of \w twelve|strong="H8648"\w* \w months|strong="H3393"\w* he \w walked|strong="H1934"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1965"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.\f + \fr 4.29 \ft in: or, upon\f*

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, Is \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, that \w I|strong="H0576"\w* have \w built|strong="H1124"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* by the \w might|strong="H8632"\w* of my \w power|strong="H2632"\w*, and for the \w honour|strong="H3367"\w* of my \w majesty|strong="H1923"\w*?

\w While|strong="H5751"\w* the \w word|strong="H4406"\w* \add was\add* in the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w*, there \w fell|strong="H5308"\w* a \w voice|strong="H7032"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \add saying\add*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, to thee it is \w spoken|strong="H0560"\w*; The \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* is \w departed|strong="H5709"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* thee.

And they shall \w drive|strong="H2957"\w* thee \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and thy \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* \add shall be\add* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w*: they shall make thee to \w eat|strong="H2939"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* as \w oxen|strong="H8450"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* thee, \w until|strong="H5705"\w* thou \w know|strong="H3046"\w* that the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H7990"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5415"\w* it to \w whomsoever|strong="H4479"\w* he \w will|strong="H6634"\w*.

The same \w hour|strong="H8160"\w* was the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H5487"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*: and he was \w driven|strong="H2957"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0399"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* as \w oxen|strong="H8450"\w*, and his \w body|strong="H1655"\w* was \w wet|strong="H6647"\w* with the \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* his \w hairs|strong="H8177"\w* were \w grown|strong="H7236"\w* like \w eagles’|strong="H5403"\w* \add feathers\add*, and his \w nails|strong="H2953"\w* like \w birds’|strong="H6853"\w* \add claws\add*.

And at the \w end|strong="H7118"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5191"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and mine \w understanding|strong="H4486"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5922"\w*, and I \w blessed|strong="H1289"\w* the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w*, and I \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* and \w honoured|strong="H1922"\w* him that \w liveth|strong="H2417"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*, whose \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, and his \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add is\add* \w from|strong="H5974"\w* \w generation|strong="H1859"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1859"\w*:

And \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H1753"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w* \add are\add* \w reputed|strong="H2804"\w* as \w nothing|strong="H3809"\w*: and he \w doeth|strong="H5648"\w* according to his \w will|strong="H6634"\w* in the \w army|strong="H2429"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \add among\add* the \w inhabitants|strong="H1753"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*: and \w none|strong="H3809"\w* \w can|strong="H0383"\w* \w stay|strong="H4223"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, or \w say|strong="H0560"\w* unto him, \w What|strong="H4101"\w* \w doest|strong="H5648"\w* thou?

At the same \w time|strong="H2166"\w* my \w reason|strong="H4486"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5922"\w*; and for the \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* of my \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, mine \w honour|strong="H1923"\w* and \w brightness|strong="H2122"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5922"\w*; and my \w counsellors|strong="H1907"\w* and my \w lords|strong="H7261"\w* \w sought|strong="H1156"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5922"\w*; and I was \w established|strong="H8627"\w* in my \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w majesty|strong="H7238"\w* was \w added|strong="H3255"\w* unto me.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* and \w extol|strong="H7313"\w* and \w honour|strong="H1922"\w* the \w King|strong="H4430"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* whose \w works|strong="H4567"\w* \add are\add* \w truth|strong="H7187"\w*, and his \w ways|strong="H0735"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w*: and those that \w walk|strong="H1981"\w* in \w pride|strong="H1467"\w* he is \w able|strong="H3202"\w* to \w abase|strong="H8214"\w*.
